column1: # Raw FRED Data Template for Forecast Comparison
# 1. Download the series below from FRED (links provided)
# 2. Copy/paste the quarterly values into this CSV
# 3. Run plot_forecast_vs_realized.py - it will calculate gcpi
# CPIAUCSL: Consumer Price Index for All Urban Consumers (Index 1982-1984=100)
# ECIWAG: Employment Cost Index: Wages and Salaries
# VOVERU: Job Openings / Unemployment Level ratio
#             Or use T10YIE (10-Year Breakeven Inflation Rate)
# CPIUFDSL: CPI Food (for relative food prices)
# CPIENGSL: CPI Energy (for relative energy prices)
# EXAMPLE: To get CPIAUCSL quarterly data from FRED:
# 3. Download CSV and copy the values below
